title: The Astral Pod
description: Sleep under the Milky Way in this fully transparent glass pod. Located on a private high-country station, you're miles from civilization but surrounded by luxury.

title: Kauri Canopy High-House
description: Suspended 10 meters above the forest floor, this architectural marvel offers ocean views and birdsong wake-up calls. Off-grid luxury at its finest.

title: The Grain Silo
description: Industrial chic meets rural tranquility. A converted grain silo with a mezzanine bedroom and a skylight for stargazing.
